section.title: UTaskAPI Class Reference

para.para: A widget class that manages interactions with a web browser.

listitem.para: A pointer to the web browser widget used for rendering web content.

section.title: Detailed Description
section.para: A widget class that manages interactions with a web browser.
This class provides functionality to update the URL of a web browser widget embedded in the Unreal Engine User Interface.

section.section:
Member Data Documentation
WebBrowserWidget WebBrowserWidgetUTaskAPI UTaskAPIWebBrowserWidget
UWebBrowser* UTaskAPI::WebBrowserWidget
A pointer to the web browser widget used for rendering web content.
The widget can be bound in the editor and configured to display web pages.
The documentation for this class was generated from the following file: Plugins/SimpleCalendarPlugin/Source/SimpleCalendarPlugin/Public/TaskAPI.h
